name: id

name: id
desc_spec: Genre. Describes the original work, such as "landscape", "portrait", "still life", etc.

name: size
desc_spec: Genre. Describes the original work, such as "landscape", "portrait", "still life", etc.

name: value
desc_spec: Genre. Describes the original work, such as "landscape", "portrait", "still life", etc.

name: id
desc_spec: Keywords. Provides a list of keywords that refer to the file or subject of the file. Separate multiple keywords with a semicolon and a blank. For example, "Seattle; aerial view; scenery".

name: size
desc_spec: Keywords. Provides a list of keywords that refer to the file or subject of the file. Separate multiple keywords with a semicolon and a blank. For example, "Seattle; aerial view; scenery".

name: value
desc_spec: Keywords. Provides a list of keywords that refer to the file or subject of the file. Separate multiple keywords with a semicolon and a blank. For example, "Seattle; aerial view; scenery".

name: id
desc_spec: Lightness. Describes the changes in lightness settings on the digitizer required to produce the file. Note that the format of this information depends on hardware used.

name: size
desc_spec: Lightness. Describes the changes in lightness settings on the digitizer required to produce the file. Note that the format of this information depends on hardware used.

name: value
desc_spec: Lightness. Describes the changes in lightness settings on the digitizer required to produce the file. Note that the format of this information depends on hardware used.

name: id
desc_spec: Medium. Describes the original subject of the file, such as "computer image", "drawing", "lithograph", and so forth.

name: size
desc_spec: Medium. Describes the original subject of the file, such as "computer image", "drawing", "lithograph", and so forth.

name: value
desc_spec: Medium. Describes the original subject of the file, such as "computer image", "drawing", "lithograph", and so forth.

name: id
desc_spec: Name. Stores the title of the subject of the file, such as "Seattle From Above".

desc_spec: Name. Stores the title of the subject of the file, such as "Seattle From Above".

name: value
desc_spec: Name. Stores the title of the subject of the file, such as "Seattle From Above".

name: id
desc_spec: Palette Setting. Specifies the number of colors requested when digitizing an image, such as "256".

desc_spec: Palette Setting. Specifies the number of colors requested when digitizing an image, such as "256".

name: value
desc_spec: Palette Setting. Specifies the number of colors requested when digitizing an image, such as "256".

name: id
desc_spec: Product. Specifies the name of the title the file was originally intended for, such as "Encyclopedia of Pacific Northwest Geography".

name: size
desc_spec: Product. Specifies the name of the title the file was originally intended for, such as "Encyclopedia of Pacific Northwest Geography".

name: value
desc_spec: Product. Specifies the name of the title the file was originally intended for, such as "Encyclopedia of Pacific Northwest Geography".

desc_spec: Subject. Describes the contents of the file, such as "Aerial view of Seattle".

desc_spec: Subject. Describes the contents of the file, such as "Aerial view of Seattle".

name: value
desc_spec: Subject. Describes the contents of the file, such as "Aerial view of Seattle".

name: id
desc_spec: Software. Identifies the name of the software package used to create the file, such as "Microsoft WaveEdit".

name: size
desc_spec: Software. Identifies the name of the software package used to create the file, such as "Microsoft WaveEdit".

name: value
desc_spec: Software. Identifies the name of the software package used to create the file, such as "Microsoft WaveEdit".

name: id
desc_spec: Sharpness. Identifies the changes in sharpness for the digitizer required to produce the file (the format depends on the hardware used).

name: size
desc_spec: Sharpness. Identifies the changes in sharpness for the digitizer required to produce the file (the format depends on the hardware used).

name: value
desc_spec: Sharpness. Identifies the changes in sharpness for the digitizer required to produce the file (the format depends on the hardware used).

name: id
desc_spec: Artist. Lists the artist of the original subject of the file. For example, "Michaelangelo".

name: size
desc_spec: Artist. Lists the artist of the original subject of the file. For example, "Michaelangelo".

name: value
desc_spec: Artist. Lists the artist of the original subject of the file. For example, "Michaelangelo".

name: id
desc_spec: Source. Identifies the name of the person or organization who supplied the original subject of the file. For example, "Trey Research".

name: size
desc_spec: Source. Identifies the name of the person or organization who supplied the original subject of the file. For example, "Trey Research".

name: value
desc_spec: Source. Identifies the name of the person or organization who supplied the original subject of the file. For example, "Trey Research".

name: id
desc_spec: Source Form. Identifies the original form of the material that was digitized, such as "slide", "paper", "map", and so forth. This is not necessarily the same as IMED.

name: size
desc_spec: Source Form. Identifies the original form of the material that was digitized, such as "slide", "paper", "map", and so forth. This is not necessarily the same as IMED.

name: value

name: id
desc_spec: Technician. Identifies the technician who digitized the subject file. For example, "Smith, John."

desc_spec: Technician. Identifies the technician who digitized the subject file. For example, "Smith, John."

name: value

name: id
desc_spec: Commissioned. Lists the name of the person or organization that commissioned the subject of the file. For example, "Pope Julian II".

name: size
desc_spec: Commissioned. Lists the name of the person or organization that commissioned the subject of the file. For example, "Pope Julian II".

name: value
desc_spec: Commissioned. Lists the name of the person or organization that commissioned the subject of the file. For example, "Pope Julian II".

name: id
desc_spec: Comments. Provides general comments about the file or the subject of the file. If the comment is several sentences long, end each sentence with a period. Do not include newline characters.

name: size
desc_spec: Comments. Provides general comments about the file or the subject of the file. If the comment is several sentences long, end each sentence with a period. Do not include newline characters.

name: value
desc_spec: Comments. Provides general comments about the file or the subject of the file. If the comment is several sentences long, end each sentence with a period. Do not include newline characters.

name: id
desc_spec: Copyright. Records the copyright information for the file. For example, "Copyright Encyclopedia International 1991." If there are multiple copyrights, separate them by a semicolon followed by a space.

name: size
desc_spec: Copyright. Records the copyright information for the file. For example, "Copyright Encyclopedia International 1991." If there are multiple copyrights, separate them by a semicolon followed by a space.

name: value
desc_spec: Copyright. Records the copyright information for the file. For example, "Copyright Encyclopedia International 1991." If there are multiple copyrights, separate them by a semicolon followed by a space.

name: id
desc_spec: Creation date. Specifies the date the subject of the file was created. List dates in year-month-day format, padding one-digit months and days with a zero on the left. For example, "1553-05-03" for May 3, 1553.

name: size
desc_spec: Creation date. Specifies the date the subject of the file was created. List dates in year-month-day format, padding one-digit months and days with a zero on the left. For example, "1553-05-03" for May 3, 1553.

name: value
desc_spec: Creation date. Specifies the date the subject of the file was created. List dates in year-month-day format, padding one-digit months and days with a zero on the left. For example, "1553-05-03" for May 3, 1553.

name: id
desc_spec: Cropped. Describes whether an image has been cropped and, if so, how it was cropped. For example, "lower right corner". IDIM Dimensions. Specifies the size of the original subject of the file. For example, "8.5 in h, 11 in w".

name: size
desc_spec: Cropped. Describes whether an image has been cropped and, if so, how it was cropped. For example, "lower right corner". IDIM Dimensions. Specifies the size of the original subject of the file. For example, "8.5 in h, 11 in w".

name: value
desc_spec: Cropped. Describes whether an image has been cropped and, if so, how it was cropped. For example, "lower right corner". IDIM Dimensions. Specifies the size of the original subject of the file. For example, "8.5 in h, 11 in w".

name: id
desc_spec: Dots Per Inch. Stores dots per inch setting of the digitizer used to produce the file, such as "300".

name: size
desc_spec: Dots Per Inch. Stores dots per inch setting of the digitizer used to produce the file, such as "300".

name: value
desc_spec: Dots Per Inch. Stores dots per inch setting of the digitizer used to produce the file, such as "300".

name: id
desc_spec: Engineer. Stores the name of the engineer who worked on the file. If there are multiple engineers, separate the names by a semicolon and a blank. For example, "Smith, John; Adams, Joe".

name: size
desc_spec: Engineer. Stores the name of the engineer who worked on the file. If there are multiple engineers, separate the names by a semicolon and a blank. For example, "Smith, John; Adams, Joe".

name: value
